name: Veloren
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Veloren is a multiplayer voxel RPG written in Rust. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress and Minecraft.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y curl git-lfs

mkdir -p /mnt/server/assets

cd /tmp.

git clone https://gitlab.com/veloren/veloren.git

## build veloran server cli
export VELOREN_USERDATA_STRATEGY=executable
cd veloren
echo -e "building veloran server, this is gonna take a bit" 
cargo build --bin veloren-server-cli --release

cp -f target/release/veloren-server-cli /mnt/server/
cp -Rf assets/{common,server,world} /mnt/server/assets/

echo -e "install complete"
